content:
Hey everyone, I have been working on the Issue #23408 and raised a PR for the same #23899, but due to the inconsistency of the UI in the pm with a deactivated user, I was wondering if we could get some suggestions on how we could make it look better. One of the approaches could be to change the color of the compass box message area to look more like a disabled one, would be great to hear more approaches and suggestions to make the UI much better and more user-friendly. Thanks.

currently the compose box in this case looks like this,
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68962290/209488799-912d0c5f-c379-4a98-8edb-50a3f18a994d.png
@Alya Abbott Could you please suggest the changes in the design of the UI, Thanks.

@Palash Baderia I think we can take the same approach as in #23944. In particular, we should disable specific buttons (not the entire compose area), and show a tooltip explaining why the button is disabled.
Great then, will start working on it, thanks.
Here is the PR with all the latest changes: #23899
